description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2020/0687/FUL dated 10/07/2020. The amendments proposed include: (i) changes to the proposed planters; (ii) removal of the patterned bronze panelling from the ground floor; (iii) changes to the bronze panelling on secondary elevations; (iv) the introduction of an ambulance bay; (v) the provision of access steps to the north-west boundary; and (vi) some other minor elevational changes.
